title: Manual patron block schema
description: Allows institution to manually block a patron from borrowing, renewing, and/or requesting until specified issue is resolved

code.description: Code of the template if block is defined based on a template (optional)

expirationDate.description: Date and time the patron block expiration if is provided the patron block should be automatically removed on that date

borrowing.description: A flag to determine borrowing block action

renewals.description: A flag to determine renewal block action

requests.description: A flag to determine request block action

metadata.description: Metadata about creation to patron block, provided by the server
